titleStmt.title: The honest vvooer his minde expressing in plaine and few termes, by which to his mistresse his love he confirmes. To the tune of, Lulling beyond her.
Honest woer.

publicationStmt.publisher: [by E. Purslowe?] for F. Coules dwelling in the Old-Baily,

notesStmt.note: An edition of: The honest woer.
In two parts; woodcuts at head of each part.
Printer's name conjectured by STC: suggested publication date from STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
